clumpy.allocation.generalized_allocation¶

clumpy.allocation.generalized_allocation(P, list_v)[source]¶

Generalized allocation rejection process.

Parameters

  • P (array-like of shape (n_samples, n_classes)) – P.sum(axis=1) should be a vector of ones.

  • list_v (list of int) – List of final classes. The classes should be in the same order as P classes.

Returns

y – The allocated classes.

Return type

array-like of shape (n_samples)

Next topic
